title: Just had my second 4v5 that I couldnt remake this week
body: Title, when a player starts the game and doesnt move or buy items, it means they arent playing. How this game cannot detect that is beyond me.

replies.body: dont forget biscuit delivery bug. if afk player has biscuit you cant remake.
Better yet, the offending player reconnects for 2.5 seconds before their shit router overheats again, thus canceling remake.
